explanation: [0-6] A hand is applying white paint to the nose of a girl wearing pink plush rabbit ears with a makeup sponge against a purple background. Then the background color changes from the right side, purple is gradually replaced by orange, a hand is applying white paint to the mouth of a boy wearing a pair of brown plush dog ears. As the yellow background completely replaces the orange background, the child is wearing a pair of black and white zebra ears on his head, with a white face, black nose and black stripes around his eyes to match the zebra ears, and a person is painting on his face with a brush. Then the background color changes from the right side, yellow is gradually replaced by teal, the child is wearing a hat with brown plush monkey ears, revealing a brown face with black stripes around the eyes and mouth to match the monkey ears, and a person is painting on his face with a brush.
